item.title: OpenAI reorganizes research team behind ChatGPT’s personality
item.description: OpenAI is shuffling the team that shapes its AI models' behavior, and its leader is moving on to another project within the company.

item.title: Screw the money — Anthropic’s $1.5B copyright settlement sucks for writers
item.description: Writers aren't getting this settlement because their work was fed to an AI -- this is just a costly slap on the wrist for Anthropic because it illegal...

item.title: Personalized AI companion app Dot is shutting down
item.description: Dot, a personalized AI companion, is shutting down.

item.title: Attorneys general warn OpenAI ‘harm to children will not be tolerated’
item.description: California Attorney General Rob Bonta and Delaware Attorney General Kathy Jennings met with and sent an open letter to OpenAI to express their concern...

item.title: Google Gemini dubbed ‘high risk’ for kids and teens in new safety assessment
item.description: Google's Gemini comes up short on kids' safety, says Common Sense Media.
